dashboardBody:
{
  "widgets": [
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 0,
      "y": 0,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/RDS", "CPUUtilization", "DBInstanceIdentifier", "nyc-tlc-datawarehouse" ],
          [ ".", "DatabaseConnections", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "FreeableMemory", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "FreeStorageSpace", ".", "." ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "RDS Performance Metrics",
        "period": 300,
        "stat": "Average"
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 12,
      "y": 0,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/S3", "BucketSizeBytes", "BucketName", "nyc-tlc-raw-data", "StorageType", "StandardStorage" ],
          [ ".", "BucketSizeBytes", "BucketName", "nyc-tlc-processed-data", "StorageType", "StandardStorage" ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "S3 Bucket Sizes",
        "period": 86400,
        "stat": "Average",
        "yAxis": {
          "left": {
            "label": "Size (Bytes)",
            "showUnits": true
          }
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 0,
      "y": 6,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/S3", "NumberOfObjects", "BucketName", "nyc-tlc-raw-data", "StorageType", "AllStorageTypes" ],
          [ ".", "NumberOfObjects", "BucketName", "nyc-tlc-processed-data", "StorageType", "AllStorageTypes" ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "S3 Object Counts",
        "period": 86400,
        "stat": "Average"
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 12,
      "y": 6,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/Lambda", "Invocations", "FunctionName", "nyc-tlc-data-processing" ],
          [ ".", "Duration", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "Errors", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "Throttles", ".", "." ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "Lambda Function Metrics",
        "period": 300,
        "stat": "Sum"
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 0,
      "y": 12,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/EC2", "CPUUtilization", "InstanceId", "i-xxxxxxxxx" ],
          [ ".", "NetworkIn", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "NetworkOut", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "DiskReadOps", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "DiskWriteOps", ".", "." ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "EC2 Instance Metrics",
        "period": 300,
        "stat": "Average"
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "metric",
      "x": 12,
      "y": 12,
      "width": 12,
      "height": 6,
      "properties": {
        "view": "timeSeries",
        "stacked": false,
        "metrics": [
          [ "AWS/States", "ExecutionTime", "StateMachineArn", "arn:aws:states:us-east-1:account:stateMachine:nyc-tlc-etl" ],
          [ ".", "ExecutionsSucceeded", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "ExecutionsFailed", ".", "." ],
          [ ".", "ExecutionsStarted", ".", "." ]
        ],
        "region": "us-east-1",
        "title": "Step Functions Metrics",
        "period": 300,
        "stat": "Average"
      }
    }
  ]
}
